verses.verse: Now <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1961>kept<s%> <S%H7462><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> his <S%H2859>father-in-law,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian:<s%> and he <S%H5090>led<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> to the <S%H310>backside<s%> of the <S%H4057>desert,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> even to <S%H2722>Horeb.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him in a <S%H3827>flame<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of a <S%H5572>bush:<s%> and he <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H5572>bush<s%> <S%H1197>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and the <S%H5572>bush<s%> was <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H398>consumed.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H4994>now<s%> turn <S%H5493>aside,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4758>sight,<s%> <S%H4069>why<s%> the <S%H5572>bush<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1197>burnt.<s%>

And when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> he turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> to <S%H7200>see,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the <S%H5572>bush,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Here<s%> am I.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Draw not <S%H7126>nigh<s%> <S%H408><s%> <S%H1988>hither:<s%> put <S%H5394>off<s%> thy <S%H5275>shoes<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thy <S%H7272>feet,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>whereon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H5975>standest<s%> is <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H127>ground.<s%>

Moreover he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am the <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>father,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5641>hid<s%> his <S%H6440>face;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he was <S%H3372>afraid<s%> to <S%H4480>look<s%> <S%H5027><s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I have surely <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6040>affliction<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and have <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H6818>cry<s%> by reason <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> their <S%H5065>taskmasters;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4341>sorrows;<s%>

And I am come <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and to bring them <S%H5927>up<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> and a <S%H7342>large,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey;<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me: and I have <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H3905>oppress<s%> them.

Come <S%H1980><s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore, and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> thee <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> that thou mayest bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt.<s%> <S%H4714><s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> am <S%H595>I,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> I should <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H3588>that<s%> I should bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt?<s%> <S%H4714><s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Certainly<s%> I will <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee; and <S%H2088>this<s%> shall be a <S%H226>token<s%> unto thee, <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> have <S%H7971>sent<s%> thee: When thou hast brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> ye shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> when <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, The <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me <S%H413>unto<s%> you; and they shall <S%H559>say<s%> to me, <S%H4100>What<s%> is his <S%H8034>name?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall I <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them?

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> I <S%H1961>AM<s%> <S%H834>THAT<s%> I <S%H1961>AM:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I <S%H1961>AM<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me <S%H413>unto<s%> you.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5750>moreover<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me <S%H413>unto<s%> you: <S%H2088>this<s%> is my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> is my <S%H2143>memorial<s%> unto all <S%H1755>generations.<s%> <S%H1755><s%>

Go, <S%H1980><s%> and <S%H622>gather<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> together, and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> I have surely <S%H6485>visited<s%> <S%H6485><s%> you, and seen that which is <S%H6213>done<s%> to you in Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

And I have <S%H559>said,<s%> I will bring you <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the <S%H4480>affliction<s%> <S%H6040><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

And they shall <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to thy <S%H6963>voice:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and ye shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> hath <S%H7136>met<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> us: and <S%H6258>now<s%> let us <S%H1980>go,<s%> we beseech <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> that we may <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H3045>sure<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>let<s%> you <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H3808>no,<s%> not by a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And I will stretch <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6381>wonders<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> thereof: and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>that<s%> he will let you <S%H7971>go.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians:<s%> and it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that, <S%H3588>when<s%> ye <S%H1980>go,<s%> ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> empty: <S%H7387><s%>

But every <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H7592>borrow<s%> of her <S%H4480>neighbor,<s%> <S%H7934><s%> and of her that <S%H4480>sojourneth<s%> <S%H1481><s%> in her <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H8071>raiment:<s%> and ye shall <S%H7760>put<s%> them <S%H5921>upon<s%> your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> and ye shall <S%H5337>spoil<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>
